modName: Taken Veterans - Bamfa the Imperial Nightblade
summary:
Imperial Nightblade - Dark Magic Assassin
\"Veterans\" are pre-built, skilled and equipped in tune with the limitations of their experience. The entire game is unexplored yet adapted to your new level.
descriptionHtml:
Taken Veterans - Balanced Character Builds

Bamfa - Female Imperial Nightblade
or Bamf - Male Imperial Nightblade

Bamfa is a bad-ass magic-flinging assassin. In combat, solo opponents fall to her devastating sneak-attacks. Groups of multiple enemies, under the spell of Bamfa\'s expert tier Illusions, tear each other apart and Bamfa has only to clean up their mess--after enjoying the show.

This Neutral Evil creature of darkness is going to make the people of Skyrim wish dragon attacks and civil war were all they had to worry about. She believes everyone exists only as playthings for her pleasure--before, during, and after their deaths at her hand. No one and no thing is safe from her remorseless killings, which are often committed just to watch the victims die. Or, as Bamfa puts it, \"for practice\".

Children dislike her the moment she arrives in town, as if they already know they are soon to be orphans with a yard full of dead pets. Bar wenches are the only thing that ever gives her pause, making unsettling comments as if they too know Bamfa\'s true nature.

Bamfa has 29 unallocated Perk Points, 220 Magicka (+50 Highborn), 220 Health, and 150 Stamina.

Bamfa\'s Initial Skills:
	Alteration, Illusion, Sneak 75
	Archery, One-Handed, Light Armor 60
	Conjuration, Restoration, Speech, Pickpocket, Heavy Armor, Two-Handed, Smithing, Enchanting, Destruction, Block, Alchemy, Lockpicking 15

3*(75*76/2) + 3*(60*61/2) + 12*(15*16/2)			
= 15,480 [url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimExp]Total Experience Spent In Skills[/url]

Bamfa\'s Spells:
	Magelight, Detect Life, Telekinesis, Waterbreathing, Detect Dead, Ebonyflesh, Paralyze
	Clairvoyance, Muffle, Frenzy, Rally, Invisibility, Pacify, Rout
	Steadfast Ward, Close Wounds, Heal Other, Repel Lesser Undead
	Bound Sword, Conjure Flame Atronach, Soul Trap, Bound Bow
	
Bamfa\'s Powers:
	Highborn (+50 Magicka)
	Highborn (Fast Daily Regen)
	Prowler\'s Profit
	
Bamfa\'s Shouts:
	Throw Voice (Zul Mey Gut)
	Marked for Death (Krii Lun Aus)
	
Bamfa\'s Gear:
	Ebony Dagger, Linwe\'s Hood, Linwe\'s Armor, Linwe\'s Gloves, Linwe\'s Boots

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
3.0 New Version (Dumped Speech & Conjuration)
1.0 Old Version (Incl. Speech and Conjuration)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Whenever a character earns a rank, r, in a skill they gain r experience. When a character has 0 in all skills they have zero experience, and when they have 100 in all skills, at level 81.5, they have 90,900 experience. A character normally hits Level 30 at 15,865 Total Experience.

Taken Veterans should look good with any texture or mesh mods you may use, if any. The mods used in the screenshots include:
Face Textures (Female): [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563]Coverwomen[/url]
Face Textures (Male): [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=26]Detailed Faces[/url]

Look in the discussions area for the batch commands allowing you to make a veteran out of a character you\'ve created yourself!

More Info:
[url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimExp]Experience Table[/url]
[url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimCharBatch]Tips on making your own veterans[/url]

Drop a Taken Veteran save game in your Saves folder and load it up. See what you think!
author: Taken
